properties.description: This dataflow transforms  raw hospital admission data

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		country as string,
		indicator as string,
		date as date,
		year_week as string,
		value as double,
		source as string,
		url as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SrcHospitalAdmissions
SrcHospitalAdmissions select(mapColumn(
		country,
		indicator,
		value,
		source,
		each(match(name=='date'),
			'reported_date' = $$),
		each(match(name=='year_week'),
			'reported_year_week' = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRequired
